description:
Suetsugi Konoha is the student council secretary and a devout Benio disciple. She has a friend, Ohno Niko. When Konoha burns with jealousy towards Mashiro, Niko agrees to help her investigate. She says she`ll do it "secretly," but doesn`t seem very good about that part.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sore wa Sore, Kore wa Kore
That`s One Thing, This Is Another
それはそれ, これはこれ
